settings.title: Show Keyboard Shortcuts
settings.description: Turns on/off showing keyboard shortcuts at the bottom of the app

settings.title: Enable
settings.description: Turns auto backup on/off. As soon as a valid path is provided, a backup of the current set of files will be created every 10 minutes.

settings.title: Path/Directory
settings.description: Specifies the path for the backup files

settings.title: Show Minimap
settings.description: Turn the mini map in the editor on or off

settings.title: Show Line Numbers
settings.description: Turn the line numbers in the editor on or off

settings.title: Word Wrap
settings.description: Turn word wrapping in the editor on or off
